Texts.Chs:
在97个部门中它都是绝对的违禁品。他们都很不错。
^cyan;+^white;30^cyan;EP^gray;，^cyan;巨量咖啡因^gray;，^red;-^white;30^red;防御^gray;，^red;精神错乱^gray;，^red;中毒^gray;(^white;持续220s^gray;)^reset;
Texts.Eng:
Absolutely illegal in 97 sectors. Awesome in all of them.
^cyan;+^white;30 ^cyan;EP^gray;, ^cyan;Extremely Caffeinated^gray;, ^red;-^white;30 ^red;Defense^gray;, ^red;Insanity^gray;, ^red;Poisoned ^gray;(^white;220s^gray;)^reset;
